trends: There have been 61 other sightings in Kokomo
There were 6 other sightings in Kokomo on or around April 15th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsi observed deep amber lights that hovered and finally displaying huge deep amber to orange light masses like they wanted to let me know of their presence. They presented themselves a few minutes before the boom. I ran into the house to see if my boyfriend was ok and I was terrified after what I just observed. My first impression was that something crashed or was shot down because I could hear heavy plane traffic and heavy activity of these amber colored lights. As I was walking back to my back door, i could see off to the west of me in the middle of a field some glowing amber orange lights slowly approaching my position and while i was observing, they put out a beautiful display of sequencing light display and little balls of deep amber projecting off one of them. I was afraid but I captured on camcorde and Mufon was contacted and are analizing my tape at present.The night after I camcorde another similar display and I contacted our local Mufon rep.
Summary: Camcorded event before and after boom
